barista_record.SQL_SELECT: SELECT poe_qahdr.firm_id, poe_qahdr.vendor_id, poe_qahdr.receiver_no, poe_qahdr.po_no, poe_qahdr.warehouse_id, poe_qahdr.ord_date, poe_qahdr.reqd_date, poe_qahdr.recpt_date, poe_qahdr.ap_ship_via, poe_qahdr.terms_code, apc_termscode.code_desc, poe_qahdr.po_frt_terms, poe_qahdr.acknowledge, poe_qahdr.promise_date, poe_qahdr.not_b4_date[$0a$]FROM poe_qahdr[$0a$]LEFT JOIN apc_termscode ON apc_termscode.firm_id=poe_qahdr.firm_id AND apc_termscode.record_id_c='C' AND apc_termscode.terms_codeap=poe_qahdr.terms_code[$0a$]

SELECT apm_vendmast.firm_id, apm_vendmast.vendor_id, apm_vendmast.vendor_name, pot_invhdr.ap_inv_no, apm_vendmast.contact_name, apm_vendmast.addr_line_1, apm_vendmast.addr_line_2, apm_vendmast.city, apm_vendmast.state_code, apm_vendmast.zip_code, apm_vendmast.phone_no, apm_vendmast.phone_exten, apm_vendmast.fax_no, apm_vendmast.alt_sequence, apm_vendmast.vend_inactive[$0a$]FROM apm_vendmast[$0a$]LEFT JOIN pot_invhdr ON pot_invhdr.firm_id=apm_vendmast.firm_id AND pot_invhdr.vendor_id=apm_vendmast.vendor_id[$0a$]

SELECT apm_vendmast.firm_id, apm_vendmast.vendor_id, apm_vendmast.vendor_name, apm_vendmast.contact_name, apm_vendmast.addr_line_1, apm_vendmast.addr_line_2, apm_vendmast.city, apm_vendmast.state_code, apm_vendmast.zip_code, apm_vendmast.phone_no, apm_vendmast.phone_exten, apm_vendmast.fax_no, apm_vendmast.alt_sequence, apm_vendmast.vend_inactive, apm_vendhist.ap_type[$0a$]FROM apm_vendmast[$0a$]LEFT JOIN apm_vendhist ON apm_vendhist.firm_id=apm_vendmast.firm_id AND apm_vendhist.vendor_id=apm_vendmast.vendor_id[$0a$]

SELECT apm_vendmast.firm_id, apm_vendmast.vendor_id, apm_vendmast.vendor_name, poe_pohdr.po_no, apm_vendmast.contact_name, apm_vendmast.addr_line_1, apm_vendmast.addr_line_2, apm_vendmast.city, apm_vendmast.state_code, apm_vendmast.zip_code, apm_vendmast.phone_no, apm_vendmast.phone_exten, apm_vendmast.fax_no, apm_vendmast.alt_sequence, apm_vendmast.vend_inactive[$0a$]FROM apm_vendmast[$0a$]LEFT JOIN poe_pohdr ON poe_pohdr.firm_id=apm_vendmast.firm_id AND poe_pohdr.vendor_id=apm_vendmast.vendor_id[$0a$]

SELECT apm_vendmast.firm_id, apm_vendmast.vendor_id, apm_vendmast.vendor_name, poe_reqhdr.req_no, apm_vendmast.contact_name, apm_vendmast.addr_line_1, apm_vendmast.addr_line_2, apm_vendmast.city, apm_vendmast.state_code, apm_vendmast.zip_code, apm_vendmast.phone_no, apm_vendmast.phone_exten, apm_vendmast.fax_no, apm_vendmast.alt_sequence, apm_vendmast.vend_inactive[$0a$]FROM apm_vendmast[$0a$]LEFT JOIN poe_reqhdr ON poe_reqhdr.firm_id=apm_vendmast.firm_id AND poe_reqhdr.vendor_id=apm_vendmast.vendor_id[$0a$]

SELECT arm_custmast.firm_id, arm_custmast.customer_id, arm_custmast.customer_name, arm_custmast.contact_name, arm_custmast.alt_sequence, arm_custdet.slspsn_code, arm_custdet.territory, arm_custdet.pricing_code, arm_custdet.tax_code, arm_custmast.addr_line_1, arm_custmast.addr_line_2, arm_custmast.addr_line_3, arm_custmast.city, arm_custmast.state_code, arm_custmast.zip_code, arm_custmast.phone_no, arm_custmast.phone_exten, arm_custmast.sic_code, arm_custmast.db_no,arm_custmast.cust_inactive[$0a$]FROM arm_custmast[$0a$]LEFT JOIN arm_custdet ON arm_custdet.firm_id=arm_custmast.firm_id AND arm_custdet.customer_id=arm_custmast.customer_id AND arm_custdet.ar_type=' '[$0a$]

SELECT arm_custmast.firm_id, arm_custmast.customer_id, arm_custmast.customer_name, opt_invhdr.order_no, opt_invhdr.ar_inv_no, arm_custmast.contact_name, arm_custmast.alt_sequence, arm_custdet.slspsn_code, arm_custdet.territory, arm_custdet.pricing_code, arm_custdet.tax_code, arm_custmast.addr_line_1, arm_custmast.addr_line_2, arm_custmast.addr_line_3, arm_custmast.city, arm_custmast.state_code, arm_custmast.zip_code, arm_custmast.phone_no, arm_custmast.phone_exten, arm_custmast.sic_code, arm_custmast.db_no, arm_custmast.cust_inactive, opt_invhdr.invoice_type[$0a$]FROM arm_custmast[$0a$]LEFT JOIN arm_custdet ON arm_custdet.firm_id=arm_custmast.firm_id AND arm_custdet.customer_id=arm_custmast.customer_id AND arm_custdet.ar_type=' ' [$0a$]LEFT JOIN opt_invhdr ON opt_invhdr.firm_id=arm_custmast.firm_id AND opt_invhdr.ar_type=' ' AND opt_invhdr.customer_id=arm_custmast.customer_id [$0a$][$0a$]

SELECT sfe_womastr.firm_id, sfe_womastr.customer_id, sfe_womastr.order_no, sfe_womastr.sls_ord_seq_ref, sfe_womastr.wo_location, sfe_womastr.wo_no, sfe_womastr.wo_type, sfe_womastr.wo_status, sfe_womastr.act_st_date, sfe_womastr.lstact_date, sfe_womastr.estcmp_date, sfe_womastr.warehouse_id, ivc_whsecode.short_name, sfe_womastr.wo_category,sfe_womastr.item_id,ivm_itemmast.item_desc,sfe_womastr.description_01,sfe_womastr.description_02,sfe_womastr.sch_prod_qty,sfe_womastr.qty_cls_todt[$0a$]FROM sfe_womastr[$0a$]LEFT JOIN ivc_whsecode ON ivc_whsecode.firm_id=sfe_womastr.firm_id AND ivc_whsecode.record_id_c='C' AND ivc_whsecode.warehouse_id=sfe_womastr.warehouse_id[$0a$]LEFT JOIN ivm_itemmast ON ivm_itemmast.firm_id=sfe_womastr.firm_id AND ivm_itemmast.item_id=sfe_womastr.item_id[$0a$]

SELECT ivm_itemmast.firm_id, ivm_itemmast.item_id, ivm_itemmast.item_desc, ivm_itemmast.product_type, ivm_itemmast.item_class, ivm_itemmast.item_type, ivm_itemmast.bar_code, ivm_itemmast.upc_code, ivm_itemmast.unit_of_sale, ivm_itemmast.weight, ivm_itemmast.lotser_item, ivm_itemmast.alt_sup_flag, ivm_itemmast.alt_sup_item, ivm_itemmast.lstrec_date, ivm_itemmast.lstiss_date, ivm_itemmast.item_inactive[$0a$]FROM ivm_itemmast

SELECT ivm_itemmast.firm_id, ivm_itemmast.item_id, ivm_itemmast.item_desc, ivm_lsmaster.lotser_no, ivm_itemmast.product_type, ivm_itemmast.item_class, ivm_itemmast.item_type, ivm_itemmast.bar_code, ivm_itemmast.upc_code, ivm_itemmast.unit_of_sale, ivm_itemmast.weight, ivm_itemmast.lotser_item, ivm_itemmast.alt_sup_flag, ivm_itemmast.alt_sup_item, ivm_itemmast.lstrec_date, ivm_itemmast.lstiss_date, ivm_itemmast.item_inactive[$0a$]FROM ivm_itemmast[$0a$]LEFT JOIN ivm_lsmaster ON ivm_lsmaster.firm_id=ivm_itemmast.firm_id AND ivm_lsmaster.item_id=ivm_itemmast.item_id[$0a$]

SELECT ivm_itemmast.firm_id, ivm_itemmast.item_id, ivm_itemmast.item_desc, ivm_itemsyn.item_synonym, ivm_itemmast.product_type, ivm_itemmast.item_class, ivm_itemmast.item_type, ivm_itemmast.bar_code, ivm_itemmast.upc_code, ivm_itemmast.unit_of_sale, ivm_itemmast.weight, ivm_itemmast.lotser_item, ivm_itemmast.alt_sup_flag, ivm_itemmast.alt_sup_item, ivm_itemmast.lstrec_date, ivm_itemmast.lstiss_date, ivm_itemmast.item_inactive[$0a$]FROM ivm_itemmast[$0a$]LEFT JOIN ivm_itemsyn ON ivm_itemsyn.firm_id=ivm_itemmast.firm_id AND ivm_itemsyn.item_id=ivm_itemmast.item_id[$0a$]

SELECT ivm_itemmast.firm_id, ivm_itemmast.item_id, ivm_itemmast.item_desc, ivm_itemvend.vendor_id, apm_vendmast.alt_sequence, ivm_itemmast.product_type, ivm_itemmast.item_class, ivm_itemmast.item_type, ivm_itemmast.bar_code, ivm_itemmast.upc_code, ivm_itemmast.unit_of_sale, ivm_itemmast.weight, ivm_itemmast.lotser_item, ivm_itemmast.alt_sup_flag, ivm_itemmast.alt_sup_item, ivm_itemmast.lstrec_date, ivm_itemmast.lstiss_date, ivm_itemmast.item_inactive[$0a$]FROM ivm_itemmast[$0a$]LEFT JOIN ivm_itemvend ON ivm_itemvend.firm_id=ivm_itemmast.firm_id AND ivm_itemvend.item_id=ivm_itemmast.item_id[$0a$]LEFT JOIN apm_vendmast ON apm_vendmast.firm_id=ivm_itemvend.firm_id AND apm_vendmast.vendor_id=ivm_itemvend.vendor_id[$0a$]

SELECT poe_pohdr.firm_id, poe_pohdr.vendor_id, poe_pohdr.po_no, poe_pohdr.warehouse_id, poe_pohdr.ord_date, poe_pohdr.reqd_date, poe_pohdr.promise_date, poe_pohdr.ap_ship_via, poe_pohdr.ap_terms_code, apc_termscode.code_desc, poe_pohdr.po_frt_terms, poe_pohdr.acknowledge, poe_pohdr.not_b4_date, poe_pohdr.req_no[$0a$]FROM poe_pohdr[$0a$]LEFT JOIN apc_termscode ON apc_termscode.firm_id=poe_pohdr.firm_id AND apc_termscode.record_id_c='C' AND apc_termscode.terms_codeap=poe_pohdr.ap_terms_code[$0a$]

SELECT poe_qadet.firm_id, poe_qadet.item_id, poe_qadet.receiver_no, poe_qadet.po_no, poe_qadet.po_line_no, poe_qahdr.vendor_id, apm_vendmast.vendor_name, poe_qahdr.recpt_date,poe_qadet.unit_measure,poe_qadet.po_line_code,poc_linecode.code_desc,poe_qadet.warehouse_id,ivc_whsecode.short_name,poe_qadet.qty_ordered,poe_qadet.qa_wip_qty,poe_qadet.qa_rej_qty, poe_qadet.qa_rec_qty,poe_qadet.unit_cost[$0a$]FROM poe_qadet[$0a$]LEFT JOIN poe_qahdr ON poe_qahdr.firm_id=poe_qadet.firm_id AND poe_qahdr.receiver_no=poe_qadet.receiver_no AND poe_qahdr.po_no=poe_qadet.po_no[$0a$]LEFT JOIN apm_vendmast ON apm_vendmast.firm_id=poe_qadet.firm_id AND apm_vendmast.vendor_id=poe_qahdr.vendor_id[$0a$]LEFT JOIN poc_linecode ON poc_linecode.firm_id=poe_qadet.firm_id AND poc_linecode.po_line_code=poe_qadet.po_line_code[$0a$]LEFT JOIN ivc_whsecode ON ivc_whsecode.firm_id=poe_qadet.firm_id AND ivc_whsecode.record_id_c='C' AND ivc_whsecode.warehouse_id=poe_qadet.warehouse_id[$0a$]

SELECT poe_reqhdr.firm_id, poe_reqhdr.vendor_id, poe_reqhdr.req_no, poe_reqhdr.warehouse_id, poe_reqhdr.ord_date, poe_reqhdr.reqd_date, poe_reqhdr.promise_date, poe_reqhdr.not_b4_date, poe_reqhdr.ap_ship_via, poe_reqhdr.ap_terms_code, apc_termscode.code_desc, poe_reqhdr.po_frt_terms, poe_reqhdr.acknowledge[$0a$]FROM poe_reqhdr[$0a$]LEFT JOIN apc_termscode ON apc_termscode.firm_id=poe_reqhdr.firm_id AND apc_termscode.record_id_c='C' AND apc_termscode.terms_codeap=poe_reqhdr.ap_terms_code[$0a$]

SELECT opt_invhdr.firm_id, opt_invhdr.ar_type, opt_invhdr.customer_id, opt_invhdr.order_no, opt_invhdr.ar_inv_no, opt_invhdr.invoice_type, opt_invhdr.backord_flag, opt_invhdr.credit_flag, opt_invhdr.order_date, opt_invhdr.shipmnt_date, opt_invhdr.ord_taken_by, opt_invhdr.customer_po_no, opt_invhdr.slspsn_code, arc_salecode.code_desc, opt_invhdr.territory, opt_invhdr.tax_code, opt_invhdr.pricing_code, opt_invhdr.disc_code, opt_invhdr.ar_dist_code, opt_invhdr.ar_ship_via, opt_invhdr.total_sales, opt_invhdr.trans_status[$0a$]FROM opt_invhdr[$0a$]LEFT JOIN arc_salecode ON arc_salecode.firm_id=opt_invhdr.firm_id AND arc_salecode.record_id_f='F' AND arc_salecode.slspsn_code=opt_invhdr.slspsn_code[$0a$]

SELECT opt_invdet.firm_id, opt_invdet.ar_type, opt_invdet.customer_id, opt_invdet.order_no, opt_invdet.ar_inv_no, opt_invdet.line_no, opt_invdet.internal_seq_no, opt_invdet.line_code, opt_invdet.warehouse_id, ivc_whsecode.short_name, opt_invdet.item_id, ivm_itemmast.item_desc, opt_invdet.order_memo, opt_invdet.commit_flag, opt_invdet.pick_flag, opt_invdet.trans_status, opt_invdet.um_sold, opt_invdet.conv_factor, opt_invdet.qty_ordered, opt_invdet.qty_backord, opt_invdet.qty_shipped, opt_invdet.std_list_prc, opt_invdet.unit_price, opt_invdet.ext_price[$0a$]FROM opt_invdet[$0a$]LEFT JOIN ivc_whsecode ON ivc_whsecode.firm_id=opt_invdet.firm_id AND ivc_whsecode.record_id_c='C' AND ivc_whsecode.warehouse_id=opt_invdet.warehouse_id[$0a$]LEFT JOIN ivm_itemmast ON ivm_itemmast.firm_id=opt_invdet.firm_id AND ivm_itemmast.item_id=opt_invdet.item_id[$0a$]

SELECT art_invhdr.firm_id, art_invhdr.ar_type, art_invhdr.customer_id, art_invhdr.ar_inv_no, art_invhdr.sequence_00, opt_invhdr.order_no, art_invhdr.invoice_date, art_invhdr.inv_due_date, art_invhdr.invoice_amt, art_invhdr.disc_taken, art_invhdr.invoice_bal[$0a$]FROM art_invhdr[$0a$]LEFT JOIN opt_invhdr [$0a$]ON opt_invhdr.firm_id=art_invhdr.firm_id AND opt_invhdr.ar_type=art_invhdr.ar_type AND opt_invhdr.ar_inv_no=art_invhdr.ar_inv_no AND opt_invhdr.customer_id=art_invhdr.customer_id[$0a$]

SELECT art_invdet.firm_id, art_invdet.ar_type, art_invdet.customer_id, art_invdet.ar_inv_no, art_invdet.sequence_num, art_invdet.trans_type, art_invdet.refchk_no, art_invdet.trans_date, art_invdet.trans_amt, art_invdet.adjdisc_amt[$0a$]FROM art_invdet

SELECT opt_invhdr.firm_id, opt_invhdr.ar_type, opt_invhdr.customer_id, opt_invhdr.ar_inv_no, opt_invhdr.order_no, opt_invhdr.trans_status, opt_invhdr.invoice_type, opt_invhdr.order_date, opt_invhdr.invoice_date, opt_invhdr.ord_taken_by, opt_invhdr.customer_po_no, opt_invhdr.slspsn_code, arc_salecode.code_desc, opt_invhdr.territory, opt_invhdr.tax_code, opt_invhdr.pricing_code, opt_invhdr.disc_code, opt_invhdr.ar_dist_code, opt_invhdr.ar_ship_via, opt_invhdr.total_sales,opt_invhdr.discount_amt,opt_invhdr.tax_amount,opt_invhdr.freight_amt[$0a$]FROM opt_invhdr[$0a$]LEFT JOIN arc_salecode ON arc_salecode.firm_id=opt_invhdr.firm_id AND arc_salecode.record_id_f='F' AND arc_salecode.slspsn_code=opt_invhdr.slspsn_code[$0a$]

SELECT poe_podet.firm_id, poe_podet.item_id, poe_podet.warehouse_id, poe_podet.po_no, poe_podet.po_line_no, poe_pohdr.vendor_id, apm_vendmast.vendor_name, poe_podet.reqd_date, poe_podet.unit_measure, poe_podet.po_line_code, poc_linecode.code_desc, poe_podet.qty_ordered, poe_podet.qty_received, poe_podet.qa_wip_qty, poe_podet.unit_cost[$0a$]FROM poe_podet[$0a$]LEFT JOIN poe_pohdr ON poe_pohdr.firm_id=poe_podet.firm_id AND poe_pohdr.po_no=poe_podet.po_no[$0a$]LEFT JOIN apm_vendmast ON apm_vendmast.firm_id=poe_podet.firm_id AND apm_vendmast.vendor_id=poe_pohdr.vendor_id[$0a$]LEFT JOIN poc_linecode ON poc_linecode.firm_id=poe_podet.firm_id AND poc_linecode.po_line_code=poe_podet.po_line_code[$0a$]

SELECT poe_reqdet.firm_id, poe_reqdet.item_id, poe_reqdet.warehouse_id, poe_reqdet.req_no, poe_reqdet.po_line_no, poe_reqhdr.vendor_id, apm_vendmast.vendor_name, poe_reqdet.reqd_date, poe_reqdet.po_line_code, poc_linecode.code_desc, poe_reqdet.source_code, poe_reqdet.location AS source, poe_reqdet.forecast, poe_reqdet.req_qty, poe_reqdet.unit_cost[$0a$]FROM poe_reqdet[$0a$]LEFT JOIN poe_reqhdr ON poe_reqhdr.firm_id=poe_reqdet.firm_id AND poe_reqhdr.req_no=poe_reqdet.req_no[$0a$]LEFT JOIN apm_vendmast ON apm_vendmast.firm_id=poe_reqdet.firm_id AND apm_vendmast.vendor_id=poe_reqhdr.vendor_id[$0a$]LEFT JOIN poc_linecode ON poc_linecode.firm_id=poe_reqdet.firm_id AND poc_linecode.po_line_code=poe_reqdet.po_line_code[$0a$]

SELECT poe_reqdet.firm_id, poe_reqdet.req_no, poe_reqdet.internal_seq_no, poe_reqdet.po_line_no, poe_reqdet.po_line_code, poc_linecode.line_type, poe_reqdet.warehouse_id, poe_reqdet.item_id, poe_reqdet.order_memo, poe_reqdet.unit_measure, poe_reqdet.conv_factor, poe_reqdet.wo_no, poe_reqdet.reqd_date, poe_reqdet.req_qty, poe_reqdet.unit_cost[$0a$]FROM poe_reqdet[$0a$]LEFT JOIN poc_linecode ON poc_linecode.firm_id=poe_reqdet.firm_id AND poc_linecode.po_line_code=poe_reqdet.po_line_code
